results.description: Use hedge fund ownership percent as crowding measure and daily specific return for short-term mean reversion. Applied SUGGESTION1 by combining two high-coverage fields (hedge_fund_ownership_percent, daily_specific_return). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage = 1.0). SUGGESTION4 applied: chose high userCount fields to improve signal reliability. Kept KEEP_IN_MIND limits (<=2 datafields, <=7 operators). Confidence set to 0.72 based on strong coverage and prior alphaCounts.

Favor stocks with high momentum but scaled for smaller market cap. SUGGESTION1: combined rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and current_market_cap_usd. SUGGESTION2 not applied (no vector). SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage high). SUGGESTION4 applied: both fields have good userCount. Adhered to KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.68 given moderate historical momentum robustness and size effect.

Long stocks with positive sentiment and high short interest decay (contrarian squeeze). Used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_shortint. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION2 not applicable. Coverage high so SUGGESTION3 skipped. Both fields have high userCounts so SUGGESTION4 applied. Within KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.65 because sentiment is noisy but userCount is high.

Combine value and momentum style loadings to capture cross-style alpha. Used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum per SUGGESTION1. No vector fields so SUGGESTION2 N/A. Coverage high -> no ts_backfill. Chose high userCount fields (applied SUGGESTION4). Kept implementation compact. Confidence 0.71 reflecting classic complementary styles.

Tilt toward low residual volatility stocks while keeping positive specific returns. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol and daily_specific_return. SUGGESTION1 applied. No vector data. High coverage so SUGGESTION3 not needed. Both have good userCount (SUGGESTION4). Implementation adheres to KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.66 as resvol is stable but timing risk exists.

Capture momentum among stocks with rising hedge fund ownership percent. Combined ts_zscore of hedge_fund_ownership_percent and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 used. No vector fields (SUGGESTION2). Coverage OK. KEEP_IN_MIND observed. Confidence 0.64 because ownership changes lag but amplify momentum.

Long stocks with high short interest but improving daily specific returns (potential short-covering). Uses short_interest_factor_score and daily_specific_return. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. No vector fields. Coverage =1 so no backfill. Respect KEEP_IN_MIND. Confidence 0.62 due to execution risk around squeezes.

Exploit persistent specific returns by momentum of the idiosyncratic component. Uses ts_zscore(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_specret_daily_lpmi,21) and daily_specific_return. SUGGESTION1 applied; high alphaCount and userCount used per SUGGESTION4. No vector fields. Confidence 0.70 because specific return momentum tends to be persistent.

Identify stocks with large hedge fund ownership percent increases adjusted by market cap. Uses ts_delta(hedge_fund_ownership_percent,20) and current_market_cap_usd. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. No vector fields. Coverage high so no backfill. Confidence 0.60 — flow signals useful but noisy.

results.idea: Sector pair: semiconductors momentum vs equipment
results.description: Long semiconductors exposure where industry momentum outpaces equipment exposure. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_indmom and semiconductors_exposure_score. SUGGESTION1 applied. No vectors. Coverage high. Chose high userCount factor for robustness (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.58 reflecting sector correlation risks.

Tilt to stocks with strong earnings quality loading and positive prospect-specific returns. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnqlty and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect_specret_monthly. SUGGESTION1 applied; earnqlty coverage slightly <1 but >0.6 so no backfill. SUGGESTION4 respected. Confidence 0.69 due to fundamental stability.

Favor stocks with rising prospect-specific daily returns relative to market momentum. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect_specret_daily and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_market. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. No vector fields. Confidence 0.63 as prospect signals can predate moves.

Short stocks at extreme short-term momentum highs using ts_arg_max and short-term reversal loading. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_strevrsl and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. No vectors. High userCounts used (SUGGESTION4). Confidence 0.61 as short-term reversals are achievable but noisy.

Long stocks with strong momentum but low specific risk variance. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and specific_risk_variance. SUGGESTION1 applied and SUGGESTION4 considered. No vector fields. Confidence 0.67 due to risk-managed momentum nature.

Long stocks where hedge fund ownership count increases significantly and short-interest is high (covering potential). Uses ts_delta(hedge_fund_ownership_count,30) and short_interest_factor_score. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 used. No vector fields. Confidence 0.59; pattern works episodically.

Isolate stock-specific momentum by subtracting market loading. Uses ts_zscore(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum,63) and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_market. SUGGESTION1 applied. No vectors. Coverage high. Confidence 0.66 as de-risked momentum.

Long stocks with high value loading and improving specific returns. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value and ts_zscore(daily_specific_return,21). SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.64 as value plus improving fundamentals tends to revert favorably.

Capture residual momentum controlling for size effect. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_specret_daily_htcri and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_size. SUGGESTION1 applied. No vector fields. Confidence 0.62 due to controlling size bias.

Short industry-exposed stocks where industry-specific momentum exceeds price momentum factor. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_indmom and price_momentum_factor_score. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.57 given sector rotation risk.

Long stocks with strong prospect-specific returns but low hedge fund ownership percent (undiscovered). Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect_specret_daily and hedge_fund_ownership_percent. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 considered. Confidence 0.60 as small ownership can indicate mispricing.

results.idea: Momentum weighted by liquidity proxy (market cap)
results.description: Favor momentum in liquid small-mid caps by dividing momentum by size. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and current_market_cap_usd. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.65 as liquidity-weighted momentum reduces slippage.

Short stocks with rising short interest but worsening prospect-specific returns (momentum breakdown). Uses ts_delta(short_interest_factor_score,30) and ts_zscore(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect_specret_daily,10). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56 due to timing risk.

Long stocks with strong earnings yield loading and positive short-term momentum. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnyild and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence 0.68 due to fundamental support to momentum.

Long stocks where prospect-specific returns outpace market factor (idiosyncratic strength). Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect_specret_daily and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_market. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.63.

Favor momentum leaders with good management quality loading. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_mgmtqlty. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.62 as mgmt quality adds stability.

Long low residual-volatility names and short high-residual-volatility names with positive specific returns. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol and daily_specific_return. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.65 as low-vol tends to outperform risk-adjusted.

Long securities where sector exposure score lags but industry momentum leads (rotation capture). Uses semiconductors_exposure_score and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_indmom. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55 due to sector correlation complexity.

Combine hedge fund ownership percent with specific risk value to favor overcrowded but low specific-risk growers. Uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent and specific_risk_value_2. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.61 balancing crowding and risk.

Long media companies with positive sentiment loading and improving daily specific returns. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_sentmt and daily_specific_return filtered by media_industry_exposure_score_2. Applied SUGGESTION1 (two fields). SUGGESTION4 used for high-sentiment userCount. KEEP_IN_MIND: used only two fields. Confidence 0.58 due to cyclical media moves.

Short-term reversal among high-value-loading small caps. Uses ts_zscore(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_ltrevrsl,126) and current_market_cap_usd. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.60 given reversion tendencies.
Long retail-exposed stocks where sector-specific momentum is rising. Uses net_retail_exposure_score and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_indmom. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.56 due to retail seasonality.

Trade stocks with large positive z-score moves in hedge fund ownership percent as breakout signal. Uses ts_zscore(hedge_fund_ownership_percent,30) and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum to confirm. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.63.

Go long high momentum and low residual volatility, short the reverse. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.67 as strategy balances return and risk.

Favor names with strong prospect-specific monthly returns but low specific_risk_variance. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_prospect_specret_monthly and specific_risk_variance. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.description: Long stocks where earnings yield is strong but short-term price momentum is weak (value catch-up). Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_earnyild and ts_zscore(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum,21). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.60.

Exploit seasonality loading vs recent specific returns. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_season and ts_zscore(daily_specific_return,63). SUGGESTION1 applied though season coverage slightly <1; SUGGESTION3 not needed. Confidence 0.54 because seasonality signal weaker.

Short names with high hedge_fund_ownership_percent and high specific_risk_value_2. Uses hedge_fund_ownership_percent and specific_risk_value_2. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.58 due to crowding risk.

Long instruments where industry-specific prospect returns exceed industry momentum. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_specret_daily_htcri and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_indmom. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61 due to idiosyncratic signal strength.

Long semiconductors exposure where value loading is high versus sector equipment exposure. Uses rsk70_mfm2_usfast_value and semiconductor_equipment_exposure_score. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55 due to cyclical industry.
